languages.text: {n}Обнажив оружие, Кибелла спокойно и даже почтительно интересуется:{/n} "Как поступить с твоими останками, когда все будет кончено, Леди Чорда?"
{n}Her weapon drawn, Kibellah enquires calmly, even respectfully,{/n} "What would you have us do with your remains once we are done here, Lady Chorda?"
languages.original_text: {n}Обнажив оружие, Кибелла спокойно и даже почтительно интересуется:{/n} "Как поступить с твоими останками, когда все будет кончено, Леди Чорда?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Her weapon drawn, Kibellah enquires calmly, even respectfully,{/n} "What would you have us do with your remains once we are done here, Lady Chorda?"
{n}Her weapon drawn, Kibellah enquires calmly, even respectfully,{/n} "What would you have us do with your remains once we are done here, Lady Chorda?"
{n}Her weapon drawn, Kibellah enquires calmly, even respectfully,{/n} "What would you have us do with your remains once we are done here, Lady Chorda?"
{n}Her weapon drawn, Kibellah enquires calmly, even respectfully,{/n} "What would you have us do with your remains once we are done here, Lady Chorda?"
{n}Her weapon drawn, Kibellah enquires calmly, even respectfully,{/n} "What would you have us do with your remains once we are done here, Lady Chorda?"
{n}Her weapon drawn, Kibellah enquires calmly, even respectfully,{/n} "What would you have us do with your remains once we are done here, Lady Chorda?"

languages.text: {n}Arma en mano, Kibellah pregunta con tono tranquilo, casi respetuoso:{/n} «Lady Chorda, ¿qué quiere que hagamos con sus restos cuando terminemos?».
languages.original_text: {n}Her weapon drawn, Kibellah enquires calmly, even respectfully,{/n} "What would you have us do with your remains once we are done here, Lady Chorda?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Arma en mano, Kibellah pregunta con tono tranquilo, casi respetuoso:{/n} «Lady Chorda, ¿qué quiere que hagamos con sus restos cuando terminemos?».

languages.text: {n}武器を引き抜いたキベラは、冷静に、敬意を込めて尋ねた。{/n}「チョーダ様、我らがここで成すべきことを成した後、ご遺体をどうしてほしいですか？」
languages.original_text: {n}Her weapon drawn, Kibellah enquires calmly, even respectfully,{/n} "What would you have us do with your remains once we are done here, Lady Chorda?"

traits.locale_text: {n}武器を引き抜いたキベラは、冷静に、敬意を込めて尋ねた。{/n}「チョーダ様、我らがここで成すべきことを成した後、ご遺体をどうしてほしいですか？」

languages.text: {n}绮贝菈抽出了武器，平静地开了口，语气里甚至带着尊重的意味。{/n}“等这件事情结束之后，你希望我们如何处理你的遗体，库尔达女士？”
languages.original_text: {n}Her weapon drawn, Kibellah enquires calmly, even respectfully,{/n} "What would you have us do with your remains once we are done here, Lady Chorda?"

traits.locale_text: {n}绮贝菈抽出了武器，平静地开了口，语气里甚至带着尊重的意味。{/n}“等这件事情结束之后，你希望我们如何处理你的遗体，库尔达女士？”

languages.text: {n}Mit gezogener Waffe fragt Kibellah ruhig, sogar respektvoll:{/n} "Was sollen wir mit Euren Überresten machen, wenn wir hier fertig sind, Lady Chorda?"
languages.original_text: {n}Her weapon drawn, Kibellah enquires calmly, even respectfully,{/n} "What would you have us do with your remains once we are done here, Lady Chorda?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Mit gezogener Waffe fragt Kibellah ruhig, sogar respektvoll:{/n} "Was sollen wir mit Euren Überresten machen, wenn wir hier fertig sind, Lady Chorda?"

languages.text: {n}Arme au clair, Kibellah s'exprime calmement, d'une voix empreinte de respect :{/n} « Que devons-nous faire de votre dépouille quand nous en aurons terminé, dame Chorda ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Her weapon drawn, Kibellah enquires calmly, even respectfully,{/n} "What would you have us do with your remains once we are done here, Lady Chorda?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Arme au clair, Kibellah s'exprime calmement, d'une voix empreinte de respect :{/n} « Que devons-nous faire de votre dépouille quand nous en aurons terminé, dame Chorda ? »

languages.text: {n}Silahı çekili vaziyette duran Kibellah, sorusunu sakince, hatta hürmerkâr bir biçimde yöneltiyor.{/n} "Burada işimiz bittiğinde senden artakalanlarla ne yapmamızı dilersin Leydi Chorda?"
languages.original_text: {n}Her weapon drawn, Kibellah enquires calmly, even respectfully,{/n} "What would you have us do with your remains once we are done here, Lady Chorda?"
